n't be voting for him for president in the next election, she expects to be doing so someday. "I'll vote for him for president when he runs," Shirley Houston said. I'd really like to see him for president. I know he'll make a good governor. Pundits say you can't leave Congress and run for president. I'm not sure that's true. It's all where God wants you to serve. Shirley Houston said that because she knows Mike Pence is a godly man, she is sure he prayed and sought the leadership of the Lord in making his decision not to run for president in 2012.

President Bush Madeleine Albright of Defense William Cohen supported the claim, saying there is not a single country that would have been supporting the president of the United States declaring war and invading Afghanistan prior to 9/11. Current Madeleine Albright of State Colin Powell told the bipartisan panel that the President Bush administration was well-briefed by the previous administration about the threat of Al Qaeda and terrorism and that President Bush was focused on Al Qaeda from the beginning. - in the biggest expansion yet by the Internet's most profitable company. AnnArbor.com reported Tuesday that the hiring will include expanding Google Inc. 's Ann Arbor AdWords office on Division. It quoted spokesman Jake Parillo saying: We expect to grow our entire Michigan operation in the coming year. The hiring spree comes as Barack Obama emphasized the need for more jobs during his State of the Union address Tuesday night. Google Inc. Technologies makes several shock-blocking sports pads. When Michael Vick returned after missing three games with a rib injury, he wore a vest designed by Unequal. He later wore shoulder pads and thigh pads made by the company. The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal, Michael Vick said in a statement acquired by the Associated Press. US X Factor. The Price Of Beauty star took to her Twitter account this week to dismiss a recent rumour that she could join Simon Cowell on the judging panel of his upcoming Fox competition. Just to clear up a rumour... I am NOT going to judge X Factor!!! I don't even know where that info came from, ( sic ) she wrote. Jessica Simpson is the latest in a string of celebrities to be linked to the show. Other names that have been mentioned as possible judges include Mariah Carey , Nicole Scherzinger and UK X Factor judge Cheryl Cole
